about_the_game:
Chuck Meowrris is a Roguelike/Roguelite/whatever this genre is. You have nine lives to complete the game and get through nine different levels. Every time you complete three levels, you face a boss. Every time you lose a life or complete a level you move to one the nine levels that you haven't completed at random. You can play as five different classes however, the class you play as is actually chosen for you instead of you choosing it. Nine lives, nine levels, three bosses, and one final boss. Can you complete Dr. Kibblesworth's Gauntlet of Randomness?

If you run into any bugs or concerns with the game, feel free to email me at whynotfailagain@gmail.com about them!
detailed_description:
Chuck Meowrris is a Roguelike/Roguelite/whatever this genre is. You have nine lives to complete the game and get through nine different levels. Every time you complete three levels, you face a boss. Every time you lose a life or complete a level you move to one the nine levels that you haven't completed at random. You can play as five different classes however, the class you play as is actually chosen for you instead of you choosing it. Nine lives, nine levels, three bosses, and one final boss. Can you complete Dr. Kibblesworth's Gauntlet of Randomness?

If you run into any bugs or concerns with the game, feel free to email me at whynotfailagain@gmail.com about them!
name: Chuck Meowrris

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: OS: Windows 7 32-bit SP1.
  • Processor: Processor: 2.0GHz.
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 compatible or better.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows-based sound card

short_description: Play as the special agent Chuck Meowrris, as you attempt to complete Dr. Kibblesworth's Gauntlet of Randomness. With nine lives and five different classes, can you complete the entirety of the Gauntlet of Randomness and defeat Dr. Kibblesworth?
